1.content: What type of fictional character
1.title: What type of fictional character

111.content: Who swaps clothes with someone?
111.title: Bleach

1111.content:
Sitting in class listening to the teacher not really paying attention ichigo noticed a flash of light and no one else seemed to notice

“How come no one else noticed the flash just now” thought ichigo while rubbing his eyes

After class orihime and Rukia asked Ichigo if he wanted to each lunch with them and agreed as he wanted to ask if they noticed the flash during class

After grabbing their lunch they headed to the school roof (like in episode 4) and began eating, after a few minutes I high decided to ask rukia and orihime but was stopped when orihime asked rukia if she would like to go clothes shopping after school

“You know what orihime I think that can be fun” answer rukia causing orihime’s smile to grow

“I don’t know how girls can spend hours on end just looking at clothes, well that sucks as I was gonna ask Rukia for a training session later” thought ichigo seemingly forgetting about the bright flash of light that only he appeared to have noticed

After finishing his train of though ichigo noticed another bright flash and when it faded he felt a breeze between his legs and looked down to see that he had swapped clothes with

Who did ichigo swap clothes with
1111.title: Ichigo

11111.content:
Ichigo was left in shock as he saw that he had swapped clothes with Rukia and was now wearing her School uniform complete with the red neck tie she wore. Ichigo felt enraged and embarrassed as many of the students looked on in shock and laughed, Orihime snapped both of them out of there thoughts and they ran from the students and hid in the roof.

Ichigo was enraged by the fact he was wearing something so girly and felt like this was Rukias doing. Rukia at the same time was left in shock as she felt stuffy in her new male student uniform outfit wondering what was going on and wanting an Answer from Ichigo

“What the hell am I wearing!” Grunted Ichigo annoyed by how cold it felt to wear a skirt. However Rukia wasn’t thinking straight and retorted with “I could ask you the same question so you better explain yourself!” Both of them were at each other’s throats meanwhile Orihime squealed in Delight “Oh my god Ichigo you look so cute in girls clothes and Rukia you look adorable”.

Both Rukia and Ichigo then groaned in anger at Orihime who backed down realising she’ll suffer if she pushes this. “Grrr shut up!” Growled Ichigo as he tried to work out what happened while trying to hold down his Skirt as he realised that to his horror that even Rukias panties swapped over making him feel like an asshole and a pervert now.

However suddenly Ichigo remembered something. “The white Light!”. He said in realisation.

“I’m sorry the what “ replied Rukia annoyed by how Ichigos clothes didn’t fit her, making her worry in case her new student trousers fell down.

Ichigo then went on too explain the white light he was seeing fly around in class, Rukia was less than convinced.

“You’re bullshitting you little pervert I bet you just wanted to wear my clothes”. Mocked Rukia wanting to Punch Ichigo, However Orihime stopped her before it escalated to a fight and eventually the death of everybody in the school. “Wait Rukia I doubt it’s Ichigo look how uncomfortable he is, let’s face it the white lights the only answer we got”.

Rukia looked at the easily irritated Ichigo and realised that Orihime was right, she then sighed. “Fine I believe you but what are we going to do about this white light”.

However before Ichigo could respond. The white light appeared with Rukia being able to see it this time and blinded them all as Ichigo had now swapped with
11111.title: Rukia

114.content: Who swaps clothes with someone?
114.title: Code geass

1141.content: Who does lelouch swap clothes with
1141.title: Lelouch

11411.content: Why do they swap clothes?
11411.title: Kallen

114111.content:
It was an average day for Milly ashford as she had lelouch and kallen going over the budget for the annual fair and couldnt help but notice that the two of them had started arguing and being the nosey person she was she could help but overhear and discovered that they were arguing over who had it tougher “kallen has got a horse in this race” thought milly as she was one of the few people to know lelouch’s true identity but still listened for her pwn entertainment

During the argument milly thought that it would be interesing for the two pf them to walk a mile in each others shoes or something like that but she know that they would never agree to it unless she blackmailed them but she used the last secrets she knew to get them to do the budget for her.

“Great they’re at it again, if they don’t stop i’ll have to do the budget myself thought milly as she heard lelouch and kallen arguing again and decided to try one her her magic spells hoping that it would work for once

“SWAP” yelled milly

“What are you trying to do now milly?” Asked lelouch

“Since you two have been arguing over who has it the worst im making you two swap places” said answered milly

“Why would we do that?” Asked Kallen

“So you fan see who has it the worst and so you can stop arguing” said milly

“NOW SWAP” yelled milly

What happens next
114111.title: Milly makes them

114112.content:
For Lelouch today was a rather stressful day as he had an important exam to prepare for while also having to plan out an attack on a knightmare production facility as he had heard rumours that the Britannians were attempting to mass produce the Lancelot in an attempt to stomp the rebellion and lelouch knew how effective just one Lancelot could be and wanted to halt any attempts at its mass production

but that would have to wait as he was currently in the middle of of study hall for the exam and he couldn’t use his geass to leave as he had already used it on the teacher for information about the exam

“I already know what’s going to be on the exam” thought Lelouch pretending to read the text book in front of himself As to not look suspicious

After being deep in thought lelouch didn't even notice that the bell had rang informing the other students that the school was over for the day and didn't notice until Kallen tapped him on his shoulder to inform him that class was over

“Thanks kallen i was so focused on studying that i guess i didnt notice that class was over” said lelouch as he began to put away his notebooks and textbooks and noticed a painful sensation in his left eye but it onky lasted for a few seconds and caused lelouch to rub his eye profusely which seemed to confuse Kallen

“Are you ok lelouch?” Asked kallen seemingly worried

“Yeah just had felt something in my eye” said lelouch

“By the way would you mind helping me study for this exam as im not sure about some of it” asked kallen which surprised lelouch as she was almost as good of a student as he was

“Sure I don’t mind helping out a friend” said lelouch thinking that kallen still thinks that he is zero and ismlooking for proof

“Ok should we head to your place for some privacy?” Asked kallen

“Sure lets go” said lelouch as they both went to lelouch’s “dorm”

What happens next
114112.title: Geass

1141121.content:
Upon entering the “dorm” lelouch noticed a familiar green haired girl walking out of the room and hoped that kallen didn't notice as it would expose his identity as zero, after making sure that CC wasn't noticed lelouch told kallen to head to his room while he asked sayoko to prepare tea for them

After leaving the dinning room lelouch saw CC waiting for him and by the look on her face he knew something was wrong as CC very rarley shows any outward emotion

“Mind telling me what wrong?” Asked lelouch

“Its your geass” said CC in her usual tone

“What about my geass?” Asked lelouch becoming a little irate

“It somehow has been altered” said CC as this caught lelouch off-guard as he was visibly surprised

“Do you know how alrered it is?” Asked lelouch while thinking about how his eye started to hurt at the end of class

“Your geass now allows you to swap clothes between people, though the limits of this ateration are still unknown due to this being this first time i have seen a geass become altered” said CC

“When you say swap clothes do you mean like those story’s you read online” Asked lelouch

“Yes” replied CC


“I might as well since she is the only one here i can test it on and im sure it would be interesting to see the results” said lelouch as he headed towards his room intent on testing his altered power

After returning to his room lelouch activated his new geass and ordered kallen to swap clothes with him

Does it work
1141121.title: They arrive at the dorm

11411211.content:
Lelouch then felt a grin appear on his face, as Kallens eyes went blank as she began to take of her school uniform. Kallen first untied her green school tie and then slowly took of her white double breasted school blazer to Lelouch’s delight

‘So CC wasn’t kidding, I really can force anyone to swap clothes, oh this is gonna be sweet’ thought Lelouch as he stared at Kallens who had now taken of her black mini skirt, shoes and white school shirt and was now standing in nothing but her back Lacy bra and panties.

Lelouch then watched as Kallen took off her bra and panties without question and stood naked in front of Lelouch which made his nose bleed a little. Lelouch was then left confused as Kallen stood with her arms out with a dumbfounded look on her face.

Lelouch then smacked his head as he realised what he had to do. “Oh of course i gotta strip down too.”

Lelouch then began to take of his Black blazer and Black tank top underneath it, while doing this he couldn’t stop thinking about all the fun he was going to have with his new incredible power. Lelouch then took of his trousers and shoes standing in nothing but his boxers to which he took a deep breath as he took of his boxers.

He smirked as he then activated his Geass again . “Ok Kallen now give me your clothes and I’ll give you mine.”

Kallen then picked up her clothes pile and gave to Lelouch with Lelouch grinning as he gave his to Kallen.

Kallen then began to dress herself up in Lelouch’s clothes as she slid on his boxers, and put on his trousers black tank top black school blazer and shoes.

Lelouch stood in amazement at his new geass as he began to put on Kallen’s bra and panties with a bizzare excitement, as he put on the black mini skirt and white shirt, finishing off his clothes swap by putting on the double breasted school blazer and green tie and shoes.

“Alright now to find out what happens when the geass wears off.” Said Lelouch as he turned off the swap.

Did Kallen notice what’s happened to her?
11411211.title: Yes

1153312.content: Who does uraraka swap clothes with?
1153312.title: Uraraka

11533122.content: How does uraraka swap clothes with midnight?
11533122.title: Midnight

115331221.content:
During class midnight had given each student of class 1A an assignment to Redesign the costume for each of their favourite pre heroes and was watching happily until she noticed a remote looking device that was covered in buttons with different label’s. Some of the buttons had labels such as “strength” life” and “clothes” to name a few

Trying not to pay attention to the remote midnight decided to walk around and check on each of the students while they were focused on their assignments

After a trip around the room she noticed 2 students in particular that made her laugh

1- deku with multiple sheets of paper scattered over his desk
2- bakugo who wouldn’t even let her look at his drawings no matter how she asked

Returning to the teachers desk midnight could avoid the remote any longer and decided to inspect it while the students were distracted by their work and noticed that beside where the remote was a folded piece of paper, upon unfolding the paper she discovered that it contained instructions on how to use the remote

“This is pure bs” yelled midnight which caused everyone to look at her

“What is pure bs miss midnight” asked uraraka

“Oh it’s nothing important just an annoying letter from mount lady, now continue with the assignment ” replied midnight in a calmer tone

After the class had returned to their work midnight picked up the remote and decided to inspect the device and decided to use the clothes button as she wanted to try some new clothes but while fantasising over trying different clothes and costumes her thumb slipped and swapped her clothes with Uraraka

Due to her thumb slipping the remote had swapped midnight and uraraka‘s clothes with a bright flash which seemed to only be visible to midnight and uraraka, after the light faded midnight felt a breeze between her legs which was odd “last time I checked I was wearing my hero costume” thought midnight until she looked down and noticed that she was now wearing the UA high girl school uniform which definitely shocked but not as much as uraraka who let out a scream

“ uraraka what happed” asked Deku as the green energy shot

“It’s nothing serious deku just thought I saw a spider” replied uraraka causing Dekunto deactivate one for all and continue with the assignment

After everything calmed down midnight had a smirk on her face while uraraka was blushing profusely, while the class was continuing with their work midnight wrote a note asking uraraka to stay behind after class so she could they could talk about their sudden outfit swap

What happens next
115331221.title: Option 1

choices: Agree and begin her makeover with Mistress Midnight and the remote
Disagree and get punished by Mistress Midnight and the remote
1153312211.content:
After class Midoriya and Tenya where waiting for Urakaka to leave the class with them, only for the blushing student to explain to her two friends that Midnight had asked her to stay behind for a tutoring session, which the two friends bought, even if they were suspicious of Urakaka and if she were telling the truth.

And after the whole class left, all that was left was Urakaka and Midnight, both staring at each other, wearing the others outfit.

“Um miss midnight, w-what did you do?!?” Nervously stuttered out Urakaka now able to fully cover herself in embarrassment, while Midnight only snickered at the girls embarrassment not only enjoying the site of the embarrassed school girl in her work uniform, but also the potential of a sidekick she had always dreamed of having.

“Well honey I don’t really know but I los it has something to do with this bizarre remote I found, but enough about that right now, I must say you look absolutely fantastic in my costume Urakaka, and I can see how much you enjoy wearing it.” Explained a sly Midnight who snickered as Urakakas face went bright red.

“What no!?, I-i mean no offence miss midnight but this kind of outfit isn’t me it’s just too revealing and provocative.” Explained Urakaka looking at the skin right dominatrix esc outfit she was now wearing.

However Midnight knew she couldn’t let such a good opportunity go to waste. “Oh but honey you look so mature and sexy in it and plus I bet that cute boy Deku you like would love the sight of you in it.” Joked Midnight watching Urakaka her flustered to the point of her quirk activating as she began to float in the air.

“W-what no me and Deku aren’t like that and besides I-i don’t want him looking at me in thi-“ said Urakaka however before she could finish her thought, Midnight interrupted her as she grabbed her pulling her back to the ground.

“Look Honey here’s the deal, what if I was able to give you some extra credit by you becoming my sexy little sidekick eh? All you gotta do is let me redesign you’re costume to suite my standards call me Mistress Midnight and then work with me for the week and see how you feel about being more sexy and raunchy, so what do you say honey?”

Urakaka didn’t know what to do, if she said yes god knows what midnight would to do to her, she’d probably use that remote to turn her into her slutty maid sidekick or something. But if she said no Midnight might not take it well and use the device on her anyway to embarrass until she agrees. Eventually Urakaka decided too....
1153312211.title: After class

135.content: Who about Kim possible or Teen titans?
135.title: Moar Cartoon's

1351.content: Who from Kim possible swaps clothes, is it Kim herself, or is it someone else like Shego?
1351.title: Kim Possible

13511.content: Who does Kin swap clothes with, maybe one of her enemies the celebrity fashionista Camille Leon who uses her shape shifting powers to swap clothes hairstyles and traits with Kim leaving her Looking like a Camille wannabe
13511.title: Kim

135111.content:
It was an average day with Kim walking down the hall towards class but was alerted by the sound of her communicator going off

“Whats the sitch wade?” Asked kim

“it appears that camile are currently robbing a high end diamond mine in Russia” said wade

“And how do you its Camile?” Asked kim being a little skeptical as she knows Camille would usually turn into someone else while committing her crimes

“Well that’s because this particular diamond mine is said to contain one of the 5 most valuable diamonds on the planet” said wade

“Do you think she’s gonna attempt to gather all five of the diamonds?” Asked Ron

“Maybe she is and though knowing her she might use two of them as earrings or for some other reason” replied Kim

“Just found this article this article that explains that each of the diamonds has the location of the next engraved within it, i think she is gonna use the first diamond to find the other 4” said wade

*1 hour later*
Kim and Ron were now standing outside of the mine but noticed that Camille was pacing back and forth while a man was using a device to find the location of the next diamond

“Cant you go any faster i want my diamond studded tiara already” whined Camille

“Even if i had the right tools this would take A while princess, there now im done and here are the coordinates for the 2nd diamond” said the man as he and Camille started to leave

“Stop right there Camille i guess diamonds aren’t a girls best friend” said Kim

“Well kim possible i have to admit I expected you 20 minutes ago” said Camille as she signalled for the guy who read the diamond to run and he did

“Ron you go after that guy while i take Camille down”

“You got it kp”

What happens next?
135111.title: Sure

1351111.content:
“Your actually gonna fight me by yourself, even for you thats a bad idea as i have combat experience while you have shopping and fashion experience” said Kim surprised that Camille was gonna fight

“Dont be so sure Possible as you do remember what my power is right” said Camille

“Yeah you can change your appearance and clothes to look like someone else” Answered Kim as she leapt forward for an attempt to restrain Camille before she could change

“But thats not all now i can now alter other people’s appearances but not to the same extent that i do to myself, want a demonstration” said Camille as she leapt towards Kim and managed to grab her shirt

When Camille grabbed Kim’s shirt that was enough to transform her mission outfit into A copy of Camille’s stripped shirt, when jeans and black healed boots.
During the transformation Kim felt every second of it and surprisingly found it to be a pleasurable experience. “Now to transform your body” said Camille as she was able to grab Kims wrist, this caused kim’s hair to turn to the same colour as Camille while also changing Kim’s body shape to match hers but Kim managed to break her grip before her face could change, this caused Kim to look more like A Camille wannabe

“my my Kim you look so good as my little wannabe.” Said Camille as she began to turn into Kim

“Just cause we look like each other doesn’t mean i cant kick your butt” Said kim before falling due to the boots she was now wearing

After getting back up and getting somewhat comfortable in her new boots Kim attempted to attack Camille but for some reason her body seemed to act on its own and Kim found herself striking A model pose just like Camille did

“From the look on your face i see that the exchange worked. Ididn’t just change your appearance i also switched our muscle memory, now i have your combat experience while you are left with my modelling experience” explained Camille as she started to run

“Your not going anywhere Camille except to jail” said Kim while attempting to attack but once again found herself in another pose which annoyed her but entertained Camille as she was laughing as she ran away while she changed herself to match what Kim looked like prior to her change

“Tata Kim I'm off to get the 2nd diamond” said Camille

What happens next
1351111.title: Camille’s new ability

choices: Ron takes her to Monique for help
13511111.content:
As Camille was running away kim decided that if she wanted her traits back she would have to defeat Camille but knew that because of Camille’s new power it would be an uphill battle as she no longer has her combat prowess

During the chase Kim found herself feeling out of breath a lot sooner than she expected but assumed that stamina was included in the swap, after catching her breath Kim noticed Camille was now using Kims acrobatic skills to effortlessly run throughout the city while avoiding anything that could be considered an obstacle and all kim could do was stare in disbelief at the sight unfolding in front of her

“There is like no way i can catch her like this, and i really should get my nails checked as i think one of them broke after i fell” said kim before covering her mouth in shock over what she had just said

After hearing what Kim said Camille decided to quickly run back towards Kim as she wanted to rub salt in Kim’s metaphorical wounds

“sorry Kim but the chase is over I hope you have fun on your little shopping spree in one of my fabulous bootleg stores.” Said Camille as she turned Kim towards a nearby store which Kim was trying her damnedest to resist but found herself running at full speed

“Now that she is out if my way its time to find out the coordinates that are in the first diamond” said Camille as she headed back to the mine

After entering the store Kim found her new body acting as if auto pilot was engaged and noticed that unlike chasing Camille her body showed not outward signs of fatigue ,it was almost like she had her old stamina back.

During the shopping spree Kim was trying on a whole plethora of Camille’s bootleg fashion and while her body below the neck acted like a child on Christmas morning her face was showing quite the opposite as she truly wanted to stop Camille and get herself back to normal while Camille was out in the world using her skills and appearance to commit crime while leaving her stuck looking like A Camille wannabe

After what seemed like hours to Kim she was now holding multiple bags each of wgich were filled with bootleg fashion

“Stop right there Camille your coming with me” said a voice that was all too familiar to Kim as she turned to see Ron with rufus on his shoulder but he didn’t stop and this caused a collision that caused the bags to fly into the air and spilling their contents resulting in a massive pile of clothes strewn across the ground

“Jeez Ron what was that for” said Kim wanting to rub her head but found her body once again moving on its own gathering the spilled contents

“That voice is that you KP?” Asked Ron

“Yeah, Camille somehow used her powers to turn me into and I quote A little wannabe” answered Kim as she stood up

“Cmon ill take you to someone i think can help” said ron

What happened next?
13511111.title: Camille escapes

135111111.content:
“Well KP lets go and see Monique as I believe she can help you out of whatever Camille has done to you” said Ron as he grabbed Kims arm and they headed towards the Banana club

When arriving Ron went to find Monique as he wasnt sure what Kim would do after he left as Camille was a little unpredictable, upon arriving back with Monique Ron noticed Kim trying to leave the Banana club and was lucky he caught her before that happened as he wouldn’t know where she went

“I thought you Kim needed my help” said Monique looking around

“I did and she is right in front of us” said ron pointing towards Kim which surprised Monique

“Oh my gosh Kim what happened to you?” Asked Monique

“I was fighting Camille Leon at the store where they were keeping one of the most valuable diamonds on the planet and rather than escaping she chose to stay and fight” said kim

“And she somehow made you look like this” asked Monique

“Exactly and now i need you two to help me look like myself again” said kim

“Oh sure kim no problem, first we should take care of that hair as you don’t suit it at all” said Monique as she pulled out a container of hair dye

“I know and after that i want to get into some comfortable clothes” said kim as she sat down and let Monique use the hair dye

While Monique was using the hair dye Kim began to feel a burning sensation on her scalp and knew it had something to do with what Camille had done to her, A second later Kim screamed in pain and asked Monique to wash it out as it made her feel like her scalp was on fire

After removing the hair dye Kim no longer felt the burning sensation but was annoyed at the fact that she can’t undo the effect of Camille’s power

While being distraught over the events that had just happened Kim heard her communicator and took a second to compose herself before answering

“Whats the sitch wade?”

“I knew that wasn't you one the security feeds” said wade as he let out a sigh of relief

“Why would Kim be on any security feeds” asked Ron

“Now that you mention it Ron i did find it weird but not as weird as kims new appearance, though i think i know what happened, you had a run in with Camille Leon didn’t you kim?”said wade

“Yeah and she somehow made me look almost like a clone of her and she somehow switched our muscle memory, could you look into that for me while we track down Camille” asked Kim

“Sure but that will have to till tomorrow as it takes a while for the inscription in the diamonds to be read and a bit longer to track her, sorry Kim” said wade

“So im stuck like this until tomorrow? Asked kim

“Im afraid so, but i have a theory on how she was able to change your appearance as well, ill get back to you when get something” said Wade as the communicator turned off

What happened next
135111111.title: Ron takes her to Monique for help

1351111111.content:
Deciding that it would be a good idea and not having any other options Kim decided it would be best to go home

Upon arriving home Kim decided to to tip toe to the stairs so she could avoid being noticed by her family but she only got halfway to the stairs before hearing her father voice form inside the living room

“KIMBERLY ANN POSSIBLE WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN” yelled James Possible which caused Kim some alarm

“Can we talk about this later i really want to get some sleep” answered Kim hoping her parents would drop the subject

“You can go to bed after we talk, now get in here” replied Ann possible

“Fine im coming in now just dont say anything about what i look like” said Kim as she walked into the living room

The first thing Kim heard After entering the living room was the sound of her two brothers laughing historically and she noticed that they both fell of their seats but they didn’t stop laughing

“I thought Kim was out there not some Camille Leon wannabe “ said Jim which angered Kim as she was already in a bad mood from earlier

“Thats enough out of you two now go to your room while your mother and i talk with your sister” said James as the twins got up and left the room

After the twins left the room Kim sat between her parents and explained what happened to her and why she looks the way she does and this caused quite a reaction from her parents as they didn’t think such a thing was possible

“Well that certainly is an interesting series of unfortunate events and normally I wouldn’t believe such a thing to be possible but your current appearance is certainly proof” Said Ann possible

“Well for now i think we should cancel your credit card so you don’t waste your money on frivolous shopping sprees“ Said James possible while Kim nodded in agreement

“Now that thats sorted im going to bed as i am really tired” Said Kim as she walked up to her room

What happens next?
1351111111.title: Kim goes home

13511111111.content:
After a night that seemed to last forever Kim woke up and noticed that it was only 5am and thought that it was the time Camille Leon wakes up at so she can plan out her outfits for the day and assumed that with her new muscle memory she might not be able to do what she actually wants to do until the new muscle memory is satisfied

After a couple of hours Kim decided to try and overcome her new muscle memory and force herself to wear what she would normally wear, after doning her usual attire Kim felt relieved for a few moments before feeling a slight but constant burning feeling throughout her body and tried to ignore it but discovered that the longer she ignored it the more unbearable it became

Deciding that she could no longer bear the burning sensation any longer Kim immediately removed her current outfit and dove head first into the pile of Camille Leon style clothes she had bought after Camille had switched with her. After her muscle memory decided on a few outfits (bootleg black and blue mini dress and a Union Jack dress) she felt both halves of her body being dragged to one until it ultimately decided on bootleg mini dress though this didn't stop her from trying the other outfit on first and taking selfies to compare how she looked in each outfit

After the outfit was chosen Kim found her body acting on auto pilot again (likely in response to her temporarily overcoming Camille’s now her muscle memory) and saw herself pulling out fake tan and began to apply it which caused her great annoyance as she personally hated fake tan and then found herself applying the same type of make up that Camille uses which made her feel like a slave to her own body

After her appearance was complete Kim found herself in control of her body again and noticed that she had spent seven hours just choosing what to wear for the day and began to run out of her house and to the school hoping she could explain things in a way the teachers would understand

After reaching the school Kim noticed that it was lunch time and decoded to spare no time by barging through the entrance (like she does in the intro) and without realizing it she had bumped into someone who recognized her

Who did she bump into?
13511111111.title: The next morning

choices: Bonnie and Kimille at the photo shoot
135111111111.content:
After reaching the school Kim noticed that it was lunch time and decoded to spare no time by barging through the entrance (like she does in the intro) and without realizing it she had bumped into someone who recognised her and to her shock and horror it was Bonnie Rockwaller

“Jeez possible why don’t you watch where your...” started Bonnie before getting a good look at Kim’s new appearance

After a moment that felt like an eternity to Kim she heard Bonnie fall to the ground while laughing historically while causing passers by to look at her which would’ve bothered her but she was to distracted by her laugher

“Ok Bonnie you had a good laugh now it’s time to stop as people are starting to stare” said Kim as she attempted to pick Bonnie up

“Just give me a minute” said Bonnie as she started to get up from the ground while her laughter turned to a quiet chuckle

“You done yet” asked kim

Yeah but more importantly Kimelle do you like wearing bootleg outfits and looking like the bimbo i knew you were” said Bonnie as she smugly look at Kim

Deciding that she wouldn't take Bonnies smugness Kim prepared a witty retort but found hersef saying “like totes, i love looking as hot and stylish as my idol Camille Leon, and i sooo suit the dumb blonde bimo look right” while striking one of Camille’s model poses

“Do you mind if i take some pictures Kimille?” Asked bonnie as she took out her phone

“Dream on” said Kim before she found her body moving on it’s own again causing her to be in a more provocative pose which caused kim to blush profusely as while her body seemed happy she was mentally dying from embarrassment

“You know what, this place doesnt have good enough light and i think we should do this properly with a photoshoot, what do you say Kimille?” Said Bonnie

“Oh hell no” said Kim but her body started to jump up and down like a kid who just had a large amout of sugar

“That settles it you are gonna have a professional photoshoot as i know a guy who owes me a favour so you can have some real fun” said Bonnie as she grabbed Kim’s arm amd started to drag her away

“I hope wade finds a way to fix this” thought kim as she tried to break free from Bonnies grip and was astonished by how weak she now felt, it made her fell like being a little kid being dragged along by her mother

What happens next

1411321.content: Who Swaps clothes in Aladdin, how about princess Jasmine?
1411321.title: Aladdin

choices: It’s time for Jasmine to play dress up
14113211.content:
So who does Princess Jasmine swap with, maybe she encounters evil incarnate herself Mirage, who decides to mess with Jasmine by trapping her in a bizzare dollhouse, and forcing her too dress up and look similar too other famous Disney princesses and characters. E.g. Cinderella.

With Jasmine being forced to walk and talk like them and do whatever Mirage forces her too while she’s dressed like them. No matter how embarrassing it is for her. So interested?
14113211.title: Sure

141132112.content:
More clothes swapping scenarios for the princess of Agrabah:

Hero for a Day: Genie plays a prank on Aladdin and Jasmine, forcing them to wear each other's clothes for a day.

Primate Predicament: Some kind of spell or magical artifact goes haywire, and Jasmine is stuck living the life of Abu, Aladdin's simian sidekick.

The Princess and the Pauper: Jasmine gets into an argument with a peasant girl and they agree to trade places for a week, and see if they can fool anyone.

Quicker Than the Eye: Mirage uses an illusion to switch appearances with Jasmine, and she has to convince everyone who she really is.

Or maybe something else!
141132112.title: Something else

1411321125.content: Maybe mirage traps Jasmine in a mansion
1411321125.title: Something else

14113211251.content:
Inside a featureless room laid an unconscious princess jasmine who suddenly awoke but then felt disoriented, thinking that she regained her composure Jasmine made an attempt to stand but found herself feeling groggy and reasoned that it was the result of magic but for some reason she couldn't deduce who was causing this to happen to her

*a few minutes later

“C’mon Jasmine you do this now get up” thought Jasmine as she summoned the strength to stand and to her delight she no longer felt as groggy

“Now to find a way out of this place” though jasmine as she noticed a door that looked out of place

After noticing the door Jasmine noticed that it looked out of place but decided to open it as there is no other way out, when the door was opened Jasmine found herself in what looks to be a foyer of a luxurious Mansion

“How did i get here?” Said Jasmine only to be suprised by the sudden appearance of Mirage

“You are here so that i can exact my revenge against you” said Mirage with an ear to ear grin on her face

“Oh hi Mirage can we skip the drama and get to the part where you get defeated?” Said Jasmine

“What makes you so sure you can beat me this time?” asked Mirage with a slightly lessened smile

“Because Aladdin and I have defeated you time and time again” said Jasmine as she began to walk towards what looked like a front door

“If you’re so sure about that then walk out that door” said Mirage

“Ok bye maybe try to be...” said Jasmine before stopping after seeing an endless void after opening the door

“Don’t bother yelling for help as you and i are the only ones who can here you” said Mirage

“Well this is certainly different but im sure i can beat you” said Jasmine

“Don't be so sure Jasmine” Said Mirage as her hand began to glow which caused Jasmine to be temporarily blinded

What happens next?
14113211251.title: Yes

choices: She made Jasmine act like Cinderella
141132112511.content:
As the light faded Jasmine didn’t look or feel any different and rolled her eyes at Mirage who was shocked to see that her magic had no effect on the princess

“I told you Mirage you can’t beat me so just leg me go and we’ll call it even” jasmine said smugly

“Fine your free to go” said Mirage as she waved her wrist to reveal the outside world

“I shall you later Mirage and try and come back with a thought out plan for once” said Jasmine as she walked towards the door

“Wait a minute I forgot to say the magic words” said Mirage as she snapped her fingers

After mirage snapped her fingers Jasmine felt as if she was being restrained by an invisible force and attempted to break free only to realise how fruitless her endeavour was which earned laughter from Mirage

“Now for stage 2 of my plan” said Mirage as she raised her hand and said “ bibbidi-bobbidi-boo”

After Mirage finished saying the magic words Jasmine felt her pant legs merge together and reshape themselves into the bottom half of a dress, her curly toed slippers changed into heeled shoes and then turned to glass, her top started to grow longer until it reach the bottom part and merged forming a light blue dress.

After Jasmine’s clothes had changed she felt an itching sensation on her scalp, though she couldn’t see it her long black hair turned blonde and forced itself into a bun, when her hair finished transforming Jasmine noticed a mirror standing in front of her but she didn’t recognise the girl in the reflection

“Oh good heavens hat has happened to me” said Jasmine as she covered her mouth after realising what she had said

“Oh this is gonna be so much fun” said Mirage

“Would you be so kind as to tell me what you did to me?” Asked jasmine blushing at her new tone of voice

“It’s quite simple, i used my mighty magical powers to turn you into a proper young lady while having some fun along the way” explained Mirage as she started to laugh

“Now what to do to you next?” Asked Mirage

What did Mirage do
141132112511.title: Jasmine outfit has been changed

1411321125111.content:
After getting over the initial shock of her situation Jasmine decided to humour Mirage in an attempt to make her bored of this plan and decided to relax herself so it would be more but decided to give one last act of defiance

“drop dead only” Jasmine attempted to say buy Mirage to use her magic to force her to perform curtesy and properly greet Mirage, and

Mirage also used her magic to force her to say “why I must thank you oh gracious Mirage for turning me into a beautiful, gracious and adorable pretty Princess, why I just love my new Blonde hair and the pretty little bow you’ve placed in it, it makes me look so fabulous, oh and I just love this sparkly stylish girly ball gown you’ve forced me to wear with these Priceless Glass heels that I just want to strut in, over my disgusting old clothes and ugly shoes, why now I look just like the pretty ditsy girly girl I’ve always dreamed of being teehee” said Jasmine, after speaking Jasmine covered her mouth in embarrassment

“ oh don’t mention it you foolish princess, Judith by that adorable look on your smug face I can just tell you adore how absolutely ridiculously girly you look now.” replied mirage as an ear to ear grin formed on her face

“Now why do you dance in that new dress of yours and show me how girly you truly are” said Mirage

“Of course mistress” said Jasmine as her body began to move on its own accord while her face turned red highlighting her embarrassment

“Oh no no we can do better” said Mirage as she raised her hands and began chanting

After the chant was finished Mirage’s hands started to glow with a tremendous amount of light which flooded the entire room with a blinding light

What happens next?
1411321125111.title: She made Jasmine act like Cinderella

choices: Next, Cinderella né Jasmine felt the world shimmer back into reality.
Meanwhile, elsewhere she was simulataneously torturing Aladdin.
Unfamiliar walls started to fade back into view...
The whispering rush of material greeted her legs, announced her moves...
141132112512.content:
The door disappeared with a faint pop, of a soap bubbling bursting. And reality faded from around Jasmine leaving her in a formless void. Only Mirage's voice gave her any direction.

"We've beaten you before... and we'll beat you again." Jasmine raged. Though at this particular moment, she couldn't be sure how.

"Certainly, you have... but if the player is different so is the game." Mirage taunted from the void.

"Have you ever heard of Cinderella?" she asked.

Jasmine folded her arms in fury, unsure which direction to glower in to show her defiance. But, she couldn't get out any words before she felt her outfit explode.

At least, that was how it felt, as her pantaloons grew thicker and thicker. A hard-won freedom from her father, being erased. No longer free to dress in an almost manly fashion, she felt layer after layer snap into existence. Each added atop the last. She was being bound to her fate as a woman, confined by a skirt...

Even her midriff was being confined. She struggled to take a deep breath to shriek her outrage, as it too was concealed and bound in what felt like the stiffest leather.

Her incredible sultry midnight raven mane, she'd combed her entire life was ripped away. A pale, golden mess now crashing over her shoulders, like waves rippling over a sandy beach.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/0a/9e/b4/...
141132112512.title: Readers choice

choices: Mulan concocted a story with a camp follower...
Mulan swapped her male clothes for one of her friends.
As she woke, she found herself dressed as a woman!
Fa Mulan was familiar with the feeling of make up, and she was horrified.
1411325.content: Fa Mulan woke, and knew that she'd have to do something to stop her secret being revealed. The previous night had just been too close a call.
1411325.title: Mulan, naturally...

choices: The whore steps out from behind a screen. She's wearing it...
Fa Mulan shrugs on a long hooded cloak to hide her shame...
She hears the sound of the troops being assembled. Soon she'll be missed...
One of her friends arrives, and mistakes her for a camp follower!?!
14113254.content:
The plan had seemed so straight forward, the previous night. But now, with her head pounding, she wondered how she'd ever imagined it working. A night spent with the camp followers, the women who serve the needs of the men in the army was meant to cement her reputation. Or at least be remembered as her idea.

However, as she woke, head pounding, Fa Mulan realised she hadn't drunk the whore under the table. Quite the opposite in fact. Her head ached with every slight movement. Her lips were coated with lipstick, and the scent of perfume hung around her body. She didn't want to think about the chill breeze that was blowing across her subtle cleavage.

Sitting up, made her groan. Feeling her bust move, threatening to fall out of her clothes. She felt the unfamiliar caress of the whore's own clothes. Tailored to display and enhance her female features it was the opposite of what she wanted.

A nearby mirror showed she looked heavily painted. Her face coloured in, as if by a child with a fetish for the gaudy and garish. Even her bust had a dusting of make-up to enhance the shadows, and make her look bustier. She also felt the padding beneath her, that was meant to give her the illusion of further curves.

Groaning and shaking her head. She wondered how to end this nightmare. This was absolutely the life she didn't want to live. This was not the position she wanted to serve in the army. She hadn't saved her father's life to merely shame him now.

Looking around, she hunted for her disguise. The army uniform that hid her figure.
14113254.title: Fa Mulan was familiar with the feeling of make ...

info.brief_description: Fictional characters suddenly swap clothes with other characters through various means
info.description:
This story is about our main character swapping clothes with other people because of various conditions.
Multiple main characters will be available and will be described in the character selection, feel free to suggest any additional characters.
Side characters can be added as you wish as long as their inclusion fits the character and story, some side characters (like girlfriends or family members) could be predetermined within descriptions as well.

Have fun with the story without many limitations, just the usual stuff like no unnecessary deaths or gore, keep it fun for everyone (above 18 at least).
Make sure you keep the swaps descriptive and interesting, sex is fine, but don't overuse it as it is not the main focus of the story.
As well as this, try to make sure the chapters stay interesting and different, chapter which contradict previous chapters may be deleted if it creates too much confusion.

Try to write decently sized chapters, after the first few branches do not create chapters containing only a few sentences , these will be deleted if they get out of hand.
The style of writing will be in third person, please keep this theme throughout the story.
